credit_line: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
title: Fork
description: Four-tined (uneven lengths), squared shoulder, flat lobed baluster neck. Silver ferrule engraved with floral sprays. Ivory handle, oval in section, tapered toward tines, carved in relief with stylized lion and unicorn on plinth. (English royal supporters?)
name: Fork
